    CONTENT - The type of content.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.Blade, org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBlade

    public class RequestBus<CONTENT>
extends org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBladeBase
    A blade that publishes content to interested subscribers, using either signals or sends.
